tasks.task: Evaluate meat goat breeds for a commercial business
subtasks: Determine breed suitability for commercial meat production

State approximate weight of fainting goats

Explain breeding origins of cacao goats
Note Kiko goat characteristics (hardy, lean meat, good mothering)

Highlight price and market demand for Black Bengal meat
